entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 11:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %

Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
